body: "In the latest chapter in the legal battle between Chevron and Ecuadorian  natives the former has raised the stakes in its offensive on the  latter," The Latin Americanist reports. The lawsuit, "alleged that the Ecuadorian plaintiffs and  their legal team aim to 'extort (Chevron) into paying to stop the campaign against it.'"
original_body: "In the latest chapter in the legal battle between Chevron and Ecuadorian natives the former has raised the stakes in its offensive on the latter," The Latin Americanist reports. The lawsuit, "alleged that the Ecuadorian plaintiffs and their legal team aim to 'extort (Chevron) into paying to stop the campaign against it.'"
title: Ecuador: Chevron Files Lawsuit Against Ecuadorian Plaintiffs

sentence: "In the latest chapter in the legal battle between Chevron and Ecuadorian  natives the former has raised the stakes in its offensive on the  latter," The Latin Americanist reports.
The lawsuit, "alleged that the Ecuadorian plaintiffs and  their legal team aim to 'extort (Chevron) into paying to stop the campaign against it.'"
